A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class DrawFrame
actionPerformed - this method need to be overriden in order to determine what to do when a button is clicked.

C

clearButton - Variable in class DrawFrame
clearButton - the JButton that clears the DrawPanel completley.
clearDrawing() - Method in class DrawPanel
public method to keep track over the Clear button pressing It will also repaint the panel via JComponent.repaint(long, int, int, int, int) method that invokes DrawPanel.paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics) method without the shapes that was drawn.
clearLastShape() - Method in class DrawPanel
Public method to keep track of the shape count after pressing the 'Undo' button.
colorChoices - Variable in class DrawFrame
colorChoices - the JComboBox containing all the color choices that user can use.
colors - Static variable in class DrawFrame
colors - the actual colors indexed the same as the colorChoices for easy generic use (update the actual color using the same index as in the colorChoice).
createShape(int...) - Method in class DrawPanel
This private method handles the creation of shapes which was given by the DrawPanel.MouseHandler.mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent).
currentColor - Variable in class DrawPanel
currentColor - The current color of the current shape
currentShape - Variable in class DrawPanel
currentShape - The Current drawing shape while mouse dragging
